summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, accepting renewal and extension of a franchise from the City of Shoreline to construct, operate and maintain an electrical system on the streets within the corporate limits of the City of Shoreline under the same terms and conditions as set forth in King County Franchise No. 7225 (P.M. \#956) until a new franchise agreement is negotiated and adopted between the City of Shoreline and the City of Seattle, or until January 30, 1998, whichever occurs first.
